message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for you. Given its worth of $12000 to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10800. This special offer is tailored to ensure you benefit from the product's full capabilities without exceeding your budget expectations. I believe this deal presents a fantastic opportunity for both of us to achieve mutual satisfaction and success. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
